content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \n{\'role\': \'system\', \'content\': \'This reminds you of these events from your past: \\nI used the "read_file" command to retrieve the "Michigan Trees" article. The command returned a conclusion on how trees benefit the environment, economy, and society in Michigan. I then used the "write_to_file" command to create a final article on the benefits of trees in Michigan, including their environmental, social, and economic contributions. By planting and caring for trees, we can create a more sustainable and prosperous Michigan for all residents. Nothing new happened.\'}'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command list_files returned: ['file_logger.txt', 'michigan_trees.txt', 'michigan_trees_article.txt', 'michigan_trees_article_final.txt', 'michigan_trees_outline.txt']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "send_tweet", "args": {"tweet_text": "Check out my latest article on Michigan trees! Learn about the environmental, social, and economic benefits of trees in Michigan and how you can support tree planting and care efforts in your own community. #MichiganTrees #Sustainability #TreePlanting https://www.example.com/michigan_trees_article_final.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command send_tweet returned: Error: Consumer key must be string or bytes, not NoneType'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "analyze_code", "args": {"code": "import tweepy\\n\\nconsumer_key = None\\nconsumer_secret = None\\naccess_token = None\\naccess_token_secret = None\\n\\nauth = tweepy.OAuthHandler(consumer_key, consumer_secret)\\nauth.set_access_token(access_token, access_token_secret)\\n\\ntweet_text = \'Check out my latest article on Michigan trees! Learn about the environmental, social, and economic benefits of trees in Michigan and how you can support tree planting and care efforts in your own community. #MichiganTrees #Sustainability #TreePlanting https://www.example.com/michigan_trees_article_final.txt\'\\n\\napi = tweepy.API(auth)\\napi.update_status(tweet_text)"}}}'}]
"""
